The easiest way to feed your dog real food

Farmer Bob’s customises recipes based on your dog’s unique needs, recommends the perfect portion and delivers it ready-to-serve straight to your door.

  1. Introduce your dog Tell us about your dog (age, weight, breed, allergies!) and we’ll design a custom plan!
  2. We deliver to you It arrives ready-to-serve on a regular schedule.
  3. Easy storage Just stick it in the fridge and serve as needed!
  4. Your dog’s will love it! Use our custom scoop to easily feed your dog the correct portion. Watch them lick the bowl clean!

How we know what’s right for your pup

In our 1 minute questionnaire we ask a few short questions about your dog including breed, age, weight, exercise level, health issues and allergies and more. We then work out it’s nutritional needs at this specific stage in life and create a meal plan that meets these needs. So you can be confident that you’re giving your dog the right nutrition.

Join the other happy dogs enjoying Farmer Bob's!
